page.title: 18EVERYDAY LIFE OF AN ADULT.
page.content: {CONTINUED FROM PAGE 17.} There is an electrical problem on an extruding machine which has suddenly stopped working.Within 30 minutes I have replaced the brushes on the motor and the machine is working.It is now 12 noon,time for a snack _ 2 corned beef sandwiches.The representative for a colour masterbatch producer arrives at 1-00p.m. We use their red,orange and black products.After discussions, he leaves at 2-00p.m. Between 2 and 4 p.m.,numerous electrical and mechan- ical faults need repair on machinery which is usually trouble-free.At 4-30 p.m.the rep.arrives from a plastics company from whom we buy p.v.c.resin. He leaves at 5-45p.m.At 6p.m.I tele- phone my wife to tell her that I am leaving the factory so that she can prepare my tea,as I may finish work any time between 5 & 8p.m. {SEE P.19..
